com.viaoa.comm.multiplexer

Class MultiplexerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.comm.multiplexer.MultiplexerClient

  • public class MultiplexerClient
extends Object
    Creates multiplexed sockets over a single socket. This is used so that a client can have multiple socket connections to multiple "virtual" server sockets through a single real socket.

    An Client can then have a single connection to a server and then have multiple virtual socket connections through this connection.

    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    to create the connection to the server.
